Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 8.5 x 7 x 4.8 inches; 4.08 Pounds
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ November 3, 2020
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ Petkin
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B08LMMSQ83
Country of Origin ‏ : ‎ USA

Gentle For Your Furry Friend – These refreshing dog wipes are extra gentle and ideal for daily use around your pet’s eyes, ears, face, body and butt. Won’t remove spot flea treatments. Perfect for your puppy, kitten and even pet pig! Lightly scented, vanilla and coconut.
Use Less Wipes – The 7 x 11 inch wipes are larger than standard wipes, making them the smart choice for large pets and helps reduce how many wipes you need to use. Moistened with a gentle cleaning formula, and enriched with a soothing organic oat extract to keep your pet’s coat soft, shiny and smelling great.
Super Convenient, Goodbye Shampoo – Petkins are perfect for quick touch ups between baths. Use as dog paw wipes after a muddy walk, or when it’s too cold for a bath outside. A great solution for older pets that are difficult to bathe.
Easy To Use – Open the lid and remove seal. Pull a wet dog wipe out. Close lid tightly. Gently wipe entire pet until clean. No water or rinsing is required. Use daily or as needed.





Read more



Original Wipes Germ Wipes Oatmeal Wipes Paw Wipes Plaque Wipes Plaque Gel
Why Use? Wipes that help freshen up your pet every day. Easily remove daily dirt and odor with a quick wipe down Heavy duty pet wipes that remove daily dirt and odor, like washing hands. Cleans your pet without shampoo Gentle pet wipes enriched with oatmeal. Easily remove daily dirt, alongside soothing dry, itchy skin The quick and convenient way to remove dirt, sand and mud from your pet’s paws after outdoor fun Dental wipes that remove daily residue to keep your pet’s teeth and gums clean and healthy Easy to use dental gel that cleans teeth, gums, plaque and tartar while freshening your pet’s breath
For Dogs & Cats ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓
No Parabens or Sulfates ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓
Veterinarian Tested ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓

Your vehicle takes a beating from harmful elements like UV and oxidation. Original Protectant Wipes deliver proven Armor All protection and shine — all with the convenience of a disposable wipe. We meticulously engineered a wipe that delivers extraordinary results — good enough for the most discerning detailers and show car owners. 100% satisfaction of your money back. Armor All absolutely guarantees its products will meet or exceed your highest standards.
One 30 count canister of Armor All Original Formula Car Protectant Wipes
A convenient wipe with the proven protection of Armor All Original Protectant
Safely cleans automotive interiors, including vinyl, plastic and rubber
Protects against UV damage to prevent cracking and fading
Adds shine to restore the rich, deep look of your dashboard, console, door panels and vinyl seats
Non-greasy and lint-free for a truly exceptional clean

It Couldn’t Be Simpler to Renew & Maintain Your Interior

Keep these wipes in your car to maintain your interior’s deep, rich look and add beautiful shine.

Apply our high-shine protectants to your car’s interior to keep your vehicle looking cleaner, longer.

Help prevent cracking, fading, discoloration, and premature aging with a variety of pleasing scents.

yadee pet finger wipes

Pet Care Wipes

Package Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 4.96 x 3.66 x 3.62 inches; 12.8 Ounces
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ July 14, 2021
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ yadee
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B099FDKBW7

Unique Textured Wipes — The two sides of the dog dental care wipes are different. One side add friction particles to make physical scrub to clean teeth more powerfully. One side is textured, soft and clean the gums without hurt.
REACH TO BACK TEETH FOR DEEP CLEAN –These dental care finger wipes will make cleaning your dog’s teeth so much easier than gauze or finger brushes. It’s slimmer, so it slides easily between the dogs cheeks and teeth, allows you to reach & feel each tooth and won’t slip off your finger.
PORTABLE & EASY TO USE — Just take out a dog teeth cleaning wipes wipes and sleeve on finger. Then wipe teeth and gum in circle motion. Presoaked wipes don’t need more steps, so it’s convenient to use anywhere, such as home, park, road trip, picnic ,etc. 100pcs Disposable wipes is enough for a long time.
UNSCENTED & SAFE — Our dog dental care wipes is unscented. No need to worry that pets hate to use it because of strange smell. (Please screw the lids tight after use.)

Easy and convenient way to clean pets teeth


Comprehensive care for pet’s oral health

CLEAN TEETH AND GUM

Dog teeth cleaning wipes can effectively remove plaque and tartar.

Prevent plaque and tartar built-up, freshen breath.

EASY TO USE

The design of the finger cover makes cleaning teeth easier,

No brushing, no toothpaste, no mess .

SAFE AND EFFECTIVE

Two different textured wipes to effectively clean pet’s teeth.

Safe for dogs and cats.

UNIVERSAL FOR DOGS AND CATS

Our finger wipes are suitable for all breeds and sizes of pets.

Safe and effective to clean the teeth and gums without hurt.
